abstract: The industrial giant said the new company would be more nimble and house developing sectors like renewable generation, energy efficiency and storage.
snippet: The industrial giant said the new company would be more nimble and house developing sectors like renewable generation, energy efficiency and storage.
lead_paragraph: General Electric, which has been moving to shed a number of divisions and return to its roots as an industrial behemoth, is creating a company to house developing energy businesses, executives said Wednesday.

headline.main: G.E. to Spin Off New Energy Technologies in One Company
headline.print_headline: G.E. Is Set to Spin Off a Business for Energy
